And now for another unrelated scam letter:

Dear Keith, 

The only prove I have for you now is the video clip of the money,
before they were package for shipment through diplomatic courier
service to Amsterdam. 

Do have confidence in me as far as this transaction is concern I hold
nothing against you let God almighty be with us in all aspect. I am 
very anxious to speak with you. know fully well we have wasted so
much time in this deal and I do not want any further delay. 

Attached is the video for your observation, please get back to me as
soon as you received this mail. 

Finally I want to let you know that you do not have to pay the
$18,300. the DEMURAGE fee has reduce because we were giving
concession of $3,000.00,so what we have to pay now is $15,300.00.  I
will furnish with the security company's contact details to contact
them and book an appointment when you will go and make the claim
personally in Amsterdam. or discussion alternative way. 

Please get intouch with me urgently, as I am awaitng your response. 

Regards, 

Baldwin.

Baldwin -
  
  It has been 2 days and Mr. Udoga still has not replied to my email. 
  I still believe he owes me an apology.  Even now he is slowing us
  down and causing problems between you and I.  He hasn't sent me any
  documentation at all!  Based on what I've seen so far, I wouldn't
  hire Mr. Udoga to walk my dog.
  
  Keith

messages.body:
DEAR FRIEND,

I AM MRS. SESE-SEKO WIDOW OF LATE PRESIDENT MOBUTU
SESE-SEKO OF ZAIRE? NOW KNOWN AS DEMOCRATIC REPUBLIC
OF CONGO (DRC). I AM MOVED TO WRITE YOU THIS LETTER,
THIS WAS IN CONFIDENCE CONSIDERING MY PRESENT
CIRCUMSTANCE AND SITUATION.

I ESCAPED ALONG WITH MY HUSBAND AND TWO OF OUR SONS
BENSON AND BASHER OUT OF DEMOCRATIC REPUBLIC OF
CONGO (DRC) TO ABIDJAN, COTE DIVOIRE WHERE MY FAMILY
AND I SETTLED, WHILE WE LATER MOVED TO SETTLED IN
MORROCO WHERE MY HUSBAND LATER DIED OF CANCER
DISEASE. HOWEVER DUE TO THIS SITUATION WE DECIDED TO
CHANGED MOST OF MY HUSBAND'S BILLIONS OF DOLLARS
DEPOSITED IN SWISS BANK AND OTHER COUNTRIES INTO OTHER

FORMS OF MONEY CODED FOR SAFE PURPOSE BECAUSE THE NEW

HEAD OF STATE OF (DR) MR LAURENT KABILA HAS MADE
ARRANGEMENT WITH THE SWISS GOVERNMENT AND OTHER
EUROPEAN COUNTRIES TO FREEZE ALL MY LATE HUSBAND'S
TREASURES DEPOSITED IN SOME EUROPEAN COUNTRIES. HENCE

MY CHILDREN AND I DECIDED LAYING LOW IN AFRICA TO
STUDY THE SITUATION TILL WHEN THINGS GETS BETTER,
LIKE NOW THAT PRESIDENT KABILA IS DEAD AND THE SON
TAKING OVER (JOSEPH KABILA). ONE OF MY LATE HUSBAND'S
CHATEAUX IN SOUTHERN FRANCE WAS CONFISCATED BY THE
FRENCH GOVERNMENT, AND AS SUCH I HAD TO CHANGE MY
IDENTITY SO THAT MY INVESTMENT WILL NOT BE TRACED AND

CONFISCATED. I HAVE DEPOSITED THE SUM THIRTY MILLION
UNITED STATE DOLLARS(US$30,000,000,00.) WITH A
SECURITY COMPANY , FOR SAFEKEEPING. THE FUNDS ARE
SECURITY CODED TO PREVENT THEM FROM
KNOWING THE CONTENT. WHAT I WANT YOU TO DO IS TO
INDICATE YOUR INTEREST THAT YOU WILL ASSIST US BY
RECEIVING THE MONEY ON OUR BEHALF.ACKNOWLEDGE THIS
MESSAGE, SO THAT I CAN INTRODUCE YOU TO MY SON 
WHO HAS THE OUT MODALITIES FOR THE CLAIM OF
THE SAID FUNDS. I WANT YOU TO ASSIST IN INVESTING THIS
MONEY, BUT I WILL NOT WANT MY IDENTITY REVEALED. I
WILL ALSO WANT TO BUY PROPERTIES AND STOCK IN
MULTI-NATIONAL COMPANIES AND TO ENGAGE IN OTHER SAFE
AND
NON-SPECULATIVE INVESTMENTS. MAY I AT THIS POINT
EMPHASISE THE HIGH LEVEL OF CONFIDENTIALITY, WHICH
THIS BUSINESS DEMANDS, AND HOPE YOU WILL NOT BETRAY
THE TRUST AND CONFIDENCE, WHICH I REPOSE IN YOU. IN
CONCLUSION, IF YOU WANT TO ASSIST US , MY SON SHALL
PUT YOU IN THE PICTURE OF THE BUSINESS, TELL YOU
WHERE THE FUNDS ARE CURRENTLY BEING MAINTAINED AND
ALSO DISCUSS OTHER MODALITIES INCLUDING REMUNERATION
FOR YOUR SERVICES.

FOR THIS REASON KINDLY FURNISH US YOUR CONTACT
INFORMATION, THAT IS YOUR PERSONAL TELEPHONE AND FAX
NUMBER FOR CONFIDENTIAL PURPOSE.

BEST REGARDS,

MRS M. SESE SEKO

messages.body:
Dear Keith,

I am Basher Mobutu Sese-seko and I will be the one to
facilitate the transaction on behalf of my family. My
mother has forwarded the email she recieved from you
to me in other that we can liase together and conclude
the transaction at hand. Our ultimate goal is to
invest the money in real estate business that is why
we contacted you in the first place. 

We are political refugees from Zaire now (Democratic
Republic of Congo). Since the demise of President
Mobutu sucessive governments of my country have
maintained a steady policy of clampdown on his fortune
and his legacy that is the reason why we want to
invest this money with somebody neutral.

My mother deposited the money in a consignment with a
security company in Amsterdam, Holland and the
government of my country is unaware of this money, if
not they would have confiscated it. hence you see the
reason why confidentiality is necessary in ensuring a
smooth completion of this transaction. Furtherance to
this we seek your assistance to travel down to
Amsterdam and take ownership of the consignment
containing the money, open an account in Amsterdam
lodge the funds in and subsequently transfer in bits
to your valid account in your country of abode. 

How do we plan to achieve this? 

My perfect modalities to ensure a risk and hitch free
duration of this deal are as follows. 

1. You will have to send me the first three pages of
your international passport (scan and send via email)
as a guarantee that the money will be safe with you
and at the same time as collateral considering the
huge amount of money we intend to leave in your care
for further for investment. 

2. After I receive the first three pages of your
international passport from you, I will contact a
Lawyer to draft a Power of Attorney, changing the
beneficiary name to your name. And I will send you a
copy which you will sign and send back to me. I will
turn send it to the Security Company in Amsterdam,
notifying them in the changes of beneficiary from
mother's to yours. 

3. The security company in Amsterdam will now take
care of all the paper work down there and in due
course I will furnish you with their contact number.
So that you can book an appointment with the Security
Company on when you are to arrive Amsterdam. 

4. We have agreed to give you 20% of the total money
as your commission for your assistance and
cooperation. I await your prompt response to my mail,
as we have to commence immediately, as you are aware
time is of equal importance as confidentiality in this
transaction. 

Regards,
Basher

And now for an unrelated scam letter:

messages.subject: RE: Personal Mail
messages.body:
FROM MR OMON PETERS
AUDITING AND ACCOUNTING UNIT. 
FIRST BANK PLC. 

I am MR OMON PETERS, the Director in charge of auditing and
accounting section of FIRST BANK PLC of Africa with due respect and
regards. I have decided to contact you on a business transaction that
will be very beneficial to both of us at the end of the transaction. 

During our investigation and auditing in this bank, my department
came across a very huge sum of money belonging to a deceased person
who died on November 
1999 in a plane crash and the fund has been dormant in his account
with this bank without any claim of the fund in our custody either
from his family or relation 
before our discovery to this development. 

Although personally, I kept this information secret Within myself and
my partner to enable the whole plans and idea be profitable and
successful during the time 
of execution. The said amount was USD$30m 
(THIRTY MILLION UNITED STATES DOLLARS). 

I am glad to say that with the introduction of Internet and website,
I was opportuned and pleasured to have come across your Contact
through this satellite media. As it may Interest you to know,
Meanwhile all the arrangement to put claim over this fund as the
bonafide next of kin to the deceased, get the required approval and
transfer this money to a foriegn account has been put in place.
Directives and needed information will be relayed to you as soon as
you indicate your interest and willingness to assist us and also
benefit your self through this great business opportunity. 

In fact I could have done this deal alone but because Of my position
in this country as a civil servant, we are not allowed to operate a
foriegn account,this is the actual reason why it will require a
second party Or fellow who will forward claims as the next of kin
With affidavit of trust to this bank and also Present a foriegn
account where he will need the money to be retransfered into. I will
not fail to inform you that this transaction is 100% risk free. On
smooth conclusion of this transaction, you will be entitled to 20% of
the total Sum as gratification, while 10% will be set aside upon
conclusion, to take care of expenses that may arise during the time
Of transfer both local and international like telephone bills, e-mail
bills include the documents fees, while 70% will be for me and my
partner. 

Please, you have been adviced to keep very confidential as we are
still in service and intend to retire from service after we conclude
this deal with you. I will be monitoring the whole situation here in
this bank until You confirm the money in your account. And ask us to
come down to your country for subsequent sharing of the fund
according to percentages indicated and to discuss profitable
investment oportunities, either in your country or any country you
advice us to invest in. 

All other necessary information will be sent to you When I hear from
you. I suggest you get back to me as Soon as possible stating your
wish in this deal. 

Yours faithfully, 

OMON PETERS
ALTERNATIVE E MAIL ADDRESS IS omonpeters3@37.com

  To assist me in procuring the $18,300 I'll need for the dumoron
  charges, I think you may be of some help. I was wondering what kind
  of tonearms you are currently using on your turntables. I have
  access to a dozen Linn Ekos Transcription tonearms which ordinarly
  sell for $2695 each. If I gave all of them to you for $1695 each,
  I'd end up with $20,340, more than enough to pay the dumoron fee. I
  would also be willing to pay the necessary freight charges for you to
  send the turntables to me to install the tonearms for you. If this
  isn't of interest to you, my cousin owns a beef jerky distributorship
  that could be used as partial payment if you don't mind me taking on
  a partner. Please let me know 
  
  Keith

messages.subject: RE: seeking investment enquiry
messages.body:
FROM: MR DEDE KUKU, 
Tel:09-27-731-812-762
Fax:09-27-11-634-6389
EMAIL: dedeku@weedmail.com

ATTN:MANAGING DIRECTOR, 

You may be suprised to recieve this letter since you don't know me
personally. I am Mr DEDE KUKU the son of Dr.PETER KUKU, who was
recently murdered in the land dispute in Zimbabwe. 

I got your contact through South Africa Information Exchange
(S.A.I.E) here in Johannesburg and I decided to write for an
assistance. My late father, was among the few black Zimbabwean rich
farmers murdered in cold blood by the agents of the ruling government
of President Robert Mugabe. For his alleged support and sympathy for
the Zimbabwean Opposition party controlled by the whites.

Before his death, he had taken me to Johannesburg to deposit the sum
of US$20,000,000.(Twenty Million United States Dollars) with a
security and finance company as if he foresaw the looming danger in
Zimbabwe. 

The money was deposited in a box as a consignment, to the security
company to avoid seizure, and also to avoid much demurrage from the
security company. This money was given to my father by president
Mugabe for investment purpose while they were still in good terms.
This land problem arose when President Robert Mugabe introduced a new
land act, which wholly affected the rich farmers, and some few blacks
eventually vehemently condemned the modus operandi adopted by the
government.

And that resulted to rampant killing and mob actions by the veterans
and some political thugs, precisely, more than thirty-one (31) people
have been killed. Heads of government from Western World, especially
Britain and United States of America have voiced their condemnation
of Mugabe 's plan subsequently, the South African Development
Community (S.A.D.C) has continuously supported Mugabe's new land
reform act. It is against this background that I and my family who
are currently staying in South Africa have decided to transfer my
fathers's money into a foreign account. 

As the eldest son of my father, I am saddled with the responsibility
of seeking an account where this money could be transferred without
the knowledge of my government who had tactically freezing our family
wealth and South African Government seems to be playing alongside
with them. we have decided not to invest this money in South Africa
for the fear of seizure and encountering the same experience in
future,since both countries have almost the same political history.
More so, the South African Foreign Exchange Policy does not allow
such investment hence I am an asylum seeker. 

As a business man I should entrust my future and that of my family on
his hands, I should let you know that this transaction is risk free.
Therefore if you accept to assist my family, we are willing to accept
any reasonable condition you may deem necessary. And we can as well
go into partnership business with you. 

please reply immediately to facilitate immediate action toward the
transaction. Remember this business is highly confidential and shall
be kept within you alone.Thanks. 

Best Regards 

Mr.DEDE KUKU.

messages.body:
Basher -
  
  Don't use a comma after the first 3 digits in $700.  You need to put
  a period, like this:  $700.00.  Commas only go after the thousands,
  like this: $70,000.00"  Also, "senven hundrend" is confusing - I
  think you mean "seven hundred".  It makes me feel good inside being
  able to help you with these financial matters!
  
  Good news! I sold another tonearm, so I have the $18,300 for the
  dumoron charge!  But, if I send you $700.00 for your mom's drug
  problem, I won't have enough left for the dumoron charge.  What
  should I do?
  
  Keith

messages.subject: the last straw
messages.body:
Basher 
  
  I'm sick and tired of being played like a fool! I don't think you're
  even serious about this deal - it's been a week since I've heard from
  you. I've worked like a dog to get you this $18,300, and you don't
  even have the manners to answer my emails. I'd slap you into next
  week if you were here right now! Maybe this is how you do things in
  Africa, but it doesn't fly over here, Bucko. No wonder you and your
  mother have money problems! I'm going to Las Vegas on Thursday the
  9th, and if I haven't heard from you by then, I'm taking the money to
  the blackjack tables, and you can forget about our deal!
  
  Very disappointed,
  
  Keith

Feb 5, 2003
  
  Hello Baldwin -
  
  My girlfriend Fester and I were VERY excited to see the video clip of
  the money.  There must have been hundreds and hundreds of dollars in
  that suitcase!  I am worried about 2 things though.  First, your
  brother Basher promised me that I wouldn't have to personally travel
  to Hamsterdam to make the claim.  I think I still have the emails
  where we discussed it if you'd like to see them - they dealt mostly
  with my rigid diet and lack of confidence in using wooden clogs.  I
  hope Basher wasn't making some drug induced promises that he couldn't
  keep!  Second,  Basher probably told you that I had taken $8800 from
  the Herky Jerky account while my cousin was still in a coma.  He (my
  cousin) regained consciousness on the 10th of January, and I had to
  put the money back before he found out that I had taken it.  Between
  that and the money I spent in Las Vegas, I only have $9400 left.  I'm
  very upset that Basher didn't have me send the $18,300 when I had it
  during the first week of January when your mother was sick.  He was
  all worried instead about needing $700 for her drug problem, and now
  I'll bet it was HIS drugs he wanted the money for!   Please tell me
  what you think I should do -
  
  your friend
  
  Keith

messages.body:
I go against Baldwins  wishes and contact Basher  
I must try to
help my fallen brother


Hello Basher -

How are you my friend?  I hope you don't mind me emailing you, but I
felt I had to.  I know that your family is upset with you right now,
and that your brother Baldwin has been empowered in your place.  I
might as well come clean and tell you that I know about your drug
sniffing as well.  Baldwin doesn't want me to contact you, but I
think I can help.  You see, I have also had an addiction problem. 
You might remember that I was afraid to travel to Amsterdam because
of my special diet and fear of wooden clogs.  The reason for the
special diet embarasses me, but step 4 of the 12 step program I'm on
is admitting my weakness.  At one point in late 2001, I was eating
about 6 1/2 pounds of Herky Jerky Extra Spicy Pemmican Bars a day. 
That's about 25 four ounce bars a day, and that's just the Extra
Spicy.  We have 8 other varieties that I'm very fond of as well. 
Another reason I didn't want to fly had to do with my inability to
even remotely fit into a first class seat on a normal jet.  I was
positively enormous.  I have lost a lot of weight since then, and am
back down into the mid 300's.  I would like to share with you the
plan that allowed me to become the master of my jerky problem; I
believe it would work for sniffing drugs as well.   I still want to
do business with your family, and I'd feel a lot better if you were
all back on good terms with one another.  I don't mind if you tell
your mother or brother about this - I think they'll see that I only
want to help.   All of the wealth that we will soon have is no good
without our health and family.  Please let me know if you'll let me
tell you about this plan.

Your friend,

Keith



And now, the first communication with the esteemed Lattimore Udoga:

messages.body:
Hello Mr. Udoga -
  
  I understand you are expecting my email.  This is very exciting for
  my girlfriend Fester and I - we want to do everything right.  I have
  a couple of questions for you.  Fester has persuaded me that perhaps
  she and I should fly to Amsterdam after all.  I have had some
  problems with my weight that I have not disclosed to Baldwin or
  Mariam that have prevented me from flying in the past.  Because I
  have slimmed down over recent months, Fester thinks we should give it
  a try.  I suppose it would be safer to transport the dumoron fees
  myself, and it's hard to resist the excitement of being there to see
  all that money in person!  Plus, we could use a vacation - we love
  windmills, dikes and tulips!
  
   Am I correct in assuming that we can bring the footwear of our
  choice without insulting the nationals?
  
  I hope this slight turn of events doesn't disrupt the transaction. 
  If it's all right with you, it could be a week or so until I can
  raise the rest of the $15,300 I'll need for the outstanding fees, as
  well as some extra spending money for sightseeing.
  
  Talk to you soon -
  
  Keith

messages.body:
Hey Baldwin -
  
  I wanted to get back to you and let you know that I am in contact
  with Mr. Udoga.  It was confusing - all of my emails came back saying
  that the address you gave me didn't exist.  I finally noticed that
  the name you gave me in the email was "lattomore", not  "lattimore". 
  I tried lattimore, and it seemed to work.  
  
  I have some excellent news.  Things with Herky Jerky are great - with
  my partner getting out of the hospital, we've pulled off a major
  business coup.   Herky Jerky has signed a contract to sponsor Heywood
  Jablome on the NASCAR circuit.  I'll be in Talledega tomorrow and
  Tuesday to finalize the deal, and then it's off to the Daytona 500
  for qualifying and the big race.  Do you guys follow NASCAR?  When we
  wrap our deal up, I'll have to have you over for a race - the Herky
  Jerky hospitality suite is going to be THE place to watch a race! 
  
  With the NASCAR contract pending, our bank will give us just about
  anything we ask for, so the dumorrage fee is no longer a problem - it
  seems like pocket change now!   And here's another surprise - it
  looks as if Fester and I might be coming to Amsterdam ourselves to
  complete our transaction and celebrate!  I already told Mr. Udoga
  about this, although I haven't heard back from him yet.  Could you
  make sure he received my email, since I did have that problem with
  his email address?
  
  Hope things are good there -
  
  Keith

messages.body:
Time for some righteous indignation, dammit:


  Baldwin -
  
  I've about had it.  I've sent 3 emails in the last 48 hours to you
  and your lawyer with no reply.  First, the email address you gave me
  for Mr. Udoga was wrong.  Check the message you sent me on Feb.7 -
  you misspelled Lattimore causing me to send my information to an
  address that didn't exist.  I figured out the correct address (no
  thanks to you) and sent him the email again.  Has he answered?  NO. 
  Then, I send you 2 emails.  The first one goes through (no reply),
  but the one I sent the next day gets bounced back to me as being
  undeliverable.  My server claims to have submitted it 54 times, so
  the problem was clearly on your end.  Now, I'm supposed to put up
  with you telling me you're not impressed with my attitude?  You say
  I'm hiding my contact??? What happened to the information I sent on
  December 1, 2002? Two phone numbers and a complete mailing address. 
  What are you people doing over there?  What in the hell does "I guest
  you
  have bad hiding agenda" mean?
  If you have been reading my emails, you should know that I'm a little
  busy right now for this kind of foolishness.  I know you had to fire
  your previous attorney, so Mr. Udoga is probably new to the job.  You
  can tell him that he has 24 hours to give me a reply and an apology;
  otherwise I suggest that you get rid of him too and hire a
  professional.  IT WOULD NOT BE A BAD IDEA TO DO A BIT OF GROVELING
  YOURSELF.  I will add the text of the last email at the end of this
  message, since you claim to have not received it.
  
  Keith


  Here I resend him the email where I invite him to the Herky Jerky
  hospitality suite and inform him that it looks as if Fester and I may
  be coming to Amsterdam after all Baldwin grovels as requested  
(Plus, he mentions  "we are financially death")
